Call Amesha Spenta

Ritual Summon Unique Commander:#1375 “Khshathra Vairya“ - Spenta of Sky and Metals,
#1376 “Vohu Manah“ - Spenta of Animals,
#1377 “Asha Vahishta“ - Spenta of Fire,
#1492 “Ameretat“ - Spenta of Plants,
#1493 “Haurvatat“ - Spenta of Waters,
#1494 “Spenta Armaiti“ - Spenta of the Earth
One of the six Amesha Spentas is summoned from the Stellar Sphere. The Amesha Spentas are divine beings and servants of the Lord of Wisdom. Each Spenta represents an aspect of their Lord. There are Spentas of animals, fire, sky and metals, earth, water and plants. All are powerful beings with magic corresponding to their nature.
